platform.title: Platform Connection

platform.whatHappens: What happens when you connect a platform:
platform.connectPoint1: A platform location or business will be connected to one of your locations
platform.connectPoint2: Reviews will be pulled from the platform and linked to that location
platform.connectPoint3: You will then be able to pull reviews for that location in the future

platform.pleaseEnterPlatformId: Please enter a Platform Location ID

slugInstructions.title: Where can I find the slug?
slugInstructions.explanation: The slug is the part of the URL that uniquely identifies the business. It varies from network to another.
slugInstructions.selectNetwork: Select a network to find out where to find the slug and what are the acceptable formats:
slugInstructions.acceptableFormats: Acceptable slug formats in order of preference:

platformIdInstructions.facebook: Find your Page ID in Page Settings > About
platformIdInstructions.google: Use Google Place ID Finder or find in Google My Business URL
platformIdInstructions.yelp: Found in your business URL: yelp.com/biz/[business-id]
platformIdInstructions.opentable: Found in your restaurant URL or OpenTable settings
platformIdInstructions.tripadvisor: Found in your location URL (e.g., tripadvisor.com/Restaurant_Review...)

platform.jobCreatedMessage: A job has been created to get your reviews. Reviews will be available shortly.
platform.slugAlreadyExists: This platform location ID already exists in the system. If this page belongs to you, please contact tech@boresha.ca for assistance.
platform.reviewsDateLimit: Reviews will be pulled from January 1, {{year}} onwards
platform.reviewsLimitFree: Only the last 25 reviews will be pulled (free plan limit)

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs. Upgrade or downgrade at any time.
pricing.faq1Question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
pricing.faq1Answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. When you upgrade, you'll be charged a prorated amount. When you downgrade, the changes will take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.
pricing.faq2Question: What happens if I exceed my free plan limit?
pricing.faq2Answer: When you reach 25 reviews on the free plan, you can either upgrade to a paid plan for unlimited reviews, or wait until the next sync when you can fetch more reviews.
pricing.faq3Answer: Monthly summaries are automatically generated at the end of each month for paid plan users. They include aggregated sentiment data, top keywords, topics, and trends to help you understand customer feedback patterns.
pricing.faq4Answer: We support Google, Facebook, Yelp, OpenTable, and TripAdvisor. More platforms are being added regularly based on user feedback.
pricing.ctaSubtitle: Join hundreds of businesses managing their online reputation

home.heroTitle: Take Control of Your Online Reputation
home.heroSubtitle: Monitor and analyze customer reviews from all major platforms in one unified dashboard.
home.feature1Desc: Aggregate reviews from Google, Facebook, Yelp, OpenTable, and TripAdvisor all in one place.
home.feature2Desc: Track reviews from multiple locations and get a unified view of your customer feedback.
home.feature3Desc: Automatically extract key insights from reviews to understand what customers are talking about.
home.feature4Desc: Get comprehensive monthly summaries of how your customers feel about your business (paid plan).
home.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

companyPage.seoDescription: View detailed review analytics for {{company}}. Track sentiment, ratings, keywords, and customer feedback across all locations and platforms.
companyPage.seoKeywords: {{company}} reviews, review analytics, customer feedback, sentiment analysis, {{industry}} reviews
companyPage.dataFiltersDescription: Filter all data on this page by location, date, keyword, rating, and topic

ratingMessage.critical: Your rating needs immediate attention. Focus on addressing customer concerns and improving service quality. Every improvement counts!
ratingMessage.low: There's significant room for improvement. Review negative feedback and implement changes. You're on the right track to better ratings!
ratingMessage.good: You're doing well! Keep focusing on customer satisfaction and addressing feedback. Small improvements can push you to excellent ratings!
ratingMessage.veryGood: Excellent work! You're close to outstanding. Continue maintaining high standards and responding to customer feedback to reach the top!
ratingMessage.excellent: Outstanding! You're delivering exceptional customer experiences. Keep up the excellent work and maintain these high standards!

companyPage.stayTuned: Stay tuned for updates! We'll notify you as soon as this feature becomes available.

companyPage.reviewsAvailableShortly: Reviews from {{platform}} will be available shortly. Use the refresh button in the top right to check for new reviews.

categoryDescriptions.service: Consider improving customer service training and response times.
categoryDescriptions.staff: Focus on staff training and customer interaction quality.

categoryDescriptions.price: Evaluate pricing strategy and value proposition.
categoryDescriptions.ambiance: Consider improving the overall atmosphere and environment.
categoryDescriptions.food: Review food quality, preparation, and presentation.
